name: BOT BALLING FPS MULTIPLAYER GAME (UNET VERSION)
name_original: BOT BALLING FPS MULTIPLAYER GAME (UNET VERSION)
description:
Some basic rules for the game.

- No more than 20 concurrent players at the same time, So please do not open in the lobby more rooms, if you see already 2 rooms for playing.

- View the video to get an idea of how it works.

- Maximum of 16 players online per room.

Controls

- W and S for moving back and front.

- A and D for moving right and left.

- You can even use the arrow keys to move.

- Left button of the mouse to fire the balls.

- Space button for making a short propulsion.

- Esc button for going out of the game or pause. In case the cursor gets locked just press alt-tab to unlock it.

- Tab button for viewing the scoreboard.

***VERY IMPORTANT TAKE AWAY THE FIREWALL OR IT MIGHT NOT WORK***

- Due to just been released, you might not find open rooms. You can send the link to your friends if you are using this network version, and open a room to play it and test it.

If it does not work and for general feedback also, please email us to uarepixels@gmail.com

We have a LAN version of the game, for you and your friends to play it, try it out!!!

https://esposcar.itch.io/lan-bot
